name: Attack
desc: (Attack) Perform a basic attack with your weapon.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: (Attack, Dmg +3, ToHit -1) Perfom a heavy attack with your weapon.

name: Quick Attack
desc: (Attack, Dmg -2, ToHit -1) Perfom a quick attack with your weapon.

name: Precision Attack
desc: (Attack, ToHit +5) Perfom a precise attack with your weapon.

name: Combo Strike
desc: (Start Combo) Allows you to perform any amount of Offensive Cards you currently have in your possession. Your Time Token is bumped up by the amount of played cards this way, or by the amount of time on the most time-consuming attack card that was used, whichever's greater.
